attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement about Government policy.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
